title: Goodreads Book Scraper
description: Extract comprehensive book data from Goodreads shelves. Provide a shelf name or direct Goodreads shelf URL. The scraper handles pagination automatically and can fetch detailed information from individual book pages.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Goodreads shelf URL to scrape (e.g., https://www.goodreads.com/shelf/show/fantasy). If provided, this overrides the Shelf parameter.

startUrls.title: Multiple Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of Goodreads shelf URLs to scrape multiple shelves in one run.

shelf.title: Shelf Name
shelf.description: Name of the Goodreads shelf to scrape (e.g., 'fantasy', 'science-fiction', 'romance'). Used only if Start URL is not provided.

collectDetails.title: Collect detailed book information
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each book's page and extract comprehensive details including full description, ISBN, publisher, genres, and more. Disable for faster scraping with basic information only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of books
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of books to scrape. Set a reasonable limit to control run time and costs.

max_pages.title: Maximum pages to scrape
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of shelf pages to visit. Each page typically contains 50 books. Note: Non-logged users can only access the first page.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for the scraper. Residential proxies recommended for accessing multiple pages. Required for pagination beyond the first page.

cookies.title: Authentication cookies
cookies.description: Raw Cookie header string from a logged-in Goodreads session. Required for accessing paginated results beyond the first page. Export from browser DevTools.

cookiesJson.title: Cookies (JSON format)
cookiesJson.description: Cookies in JSON format. Accepts array format: [{"name":"cookie_name","value":"cookie_value"}] or object format: {"cookie_name":"cookie_value"}
